addons_description.box: Box is a file storage add-on. Connect your Box account to an PROVIDEDH project to interact with files hosted on Box via the PROVIDEDH.
addons_description.dataverse: Dataverse is an open source software application to share, cite, and archive data. Connect your Dataverse account to share your Dataverse datasets via the PROVIDEDH.
addons_description.dropbox: Dropbox is a file storage add-on. Connect your Dropbox account to an PROVIDEDH project to interact with files hosted on Dropbox via the PROVIDEDH.
addons_description.figshare: Figshare is an online digital repository. Connect your figshare account to share your figshare files along with other materials in your PROVIDEDH project.
addons_description.forward: The External Link add-on allows you to provide a link to a website outside of the PROVIDEDH.
addons_description.github: GitHub is a web-based Git repository hosting service. Connect your GitHub repo to your PROVIDEDH project to share your code alongside other materials in your PROVIDEDH project.
addons_description.gitlab: GitLab is an open-source web-based Git repository hosting tool and service. Connect your GitLab repo to your PROVIDEDH project to share your code alongside other materials in your PROVIDEDH project.
addons_description.mendeley: Mendeley is a reference management tool. Connecting Mendeley folders to PROVIDEDH projects allows you and others to view, copy, and download citations that are relevant to your project from the Project Overview page.
addons_description.zotero: Zotero is a reference management tool. Connecting Zotero folders to PROVIDEDH projects allows you and others to view, copy, and download citations that are relevant to your project from the Project Overview page.
addons_description.osfstorage: OSF Storage is the default storage provider for PROVIDEDH projects.
addons_description.owncloud: ownCloud is an open source, self-hosted file sync and share app platform. Connect your ownCloud account to an PROVIDEDH project to interact with files hosted on ownCloud via the PROVIDEDH.
addons_description.s3: Amazon S3 is a file storage add-on. Connect your S3 account to an PROVIDEDH project to interact with files hosted on S3 via the PROVIDEDH.
addons_description.teistats: Sample add-on that counts given XML elements in TEI P5 files. The first test add-on in the PROVIDEDH.
addons_description.teiclose: Close reading of TEI P5 files and user-friendly annotating them.
addons_description.peoplevis: Visualization of connections between uncertanities on map
addons_description.twofactor: Two-factor authentication is a security add-on. By using two-factor authentication, you'll protect your PROVIDEDH account with both your password and your mobile phone.
addons_description.wiki: The wiki is a versatile communication tool. Wikis can be used to explain the main points of your project and can contain information like lab notes or contact information.
addons_description.googledrive: Google Drive is a file storage add-on. Connect your Google Drive account to an PROVIDEDH project to interact with files hosted on Google Drive via the PROVIDEDH.
addons_description.bitbucket: Bitbucket is a web-based Git repository hosting service. Connect your Bitbucket repo to your PROVIDEDH project to share your code alongside other materials in your PROVIDEDH project.
addons_description.onedrive: Microsoft OneDrive is a file storage add-on. Connect your Microsoft OneDrive account to an PROVIDEDH project to interact with files hosted on Microsoft OneDrive via the PROVIDEDH.
